mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.loadnum AS "loadnum", a.url AS "url", a.cdnurl as "cdnurl", a.name AS "name", a.maxload AS "maxload", a.online_flag AS "onlineFlag", a.optimal_config AS "optimalConfig", a.ipaddress AS "ipaddress", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.location AS "location", a.carrier AS "carrier", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_nodeserver( id, loadnum, url, cdnurl, name, maxload, online_flag, optimal_config, ipaddress, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, location, carrier, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( default, #{loadnum}, #{url}, #{cdnurl}, #{name}, #{maxload}, #{onlineFlag}, #{optimalConfig}, #{ipaddress}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{location}, #{carrier}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_nodeserver SET loadnum = #{loadnum}, url = #{url}, cdnurl = #{cdnurl}, name = #{name}, maxload = #{maxload}, online_flag = #{onlineFlag}, optimal_config = #{optimalConfig}, ipaddress = #{ipaddress}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, location = #{location}, carrier = #{carrier}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
